subject: Refund
description_text:
I would like a refund as nothing has actually been done, and when Otto
Prutha promised my package was shipped on the 4th and would be arriving on
the 9th, all he did was create a shipping label and nothing happened after
that. Im going to be purchasing another product elsewhere.
Thanks for nothing.

conversations.body_text: Hi Carlos Rios,    We pushed our US warehouse staff again, they feedback that it has been shipped on Monday, but there is a delay in updating due to the recent busy logistics, it should be delivered for you in the next two days, please don't worry.

Thank you for the update. Sorry for stressing you out. USPS just received
the package, I appreciate your patience with me and completely understand
its not your fault, and thank you again.

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025, 10:06 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Carlos Rios,  Thanks for your understanding and feedback, have fun bro!

Im sorry but USPS really is the worst. My package is bouncing around
everywhere and finally got close to me when suddenly it was shipped to
texas usps center and then now mobile alabama distribution center and its
stuck and never arriving here. Im gonna go ahead and ask for a refund. And
if I dont get it I'll just contact my bank to refund me from you guys. Next
time avoid using USPS.
